exmls.content:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameSceneSkin" width="640" height="1150" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Group id="fallMoneyGroup" height="1150" width="640">
	</e:Group>
	<e:Label id="moneyLabel" text="标签" y="164" textColor="0x030000" width="210" height="76" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Label id="timeLabel" y="250" textColor="0x030000" text="标签" horizontalCenter="0" width="210" height="76" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" x="10"/>
	<e:Image id="staticMoney" source="mb0_png" y="550" x="130"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="HomeSceneSkin" width="640" height="1150" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="money" source="m0_png" x="135" y="798"/>
	<e:Image id="title" source="splashtitle_png" y="55" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="arrow" source="starttip_png" x="294" y="722"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ResultUISkin" width="640" height="480" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="dlgbg_png" width="640"/>
	<e:Image id="startBtn" source="start_png" x="60" y="311"/>
	<e:Image id="rankBtn" source="rank_png" x="270" y="315"/>
	<e:Image id="shareBtn" source="share_png" x="478" y="307"/>
	<e:Label id="resultLabel" text="标签" y="66" width="425" height="185" x="108"/>
</e:Skin>
